𐀒𐀫𐀜𐀸𐀭 ko-ro-no-we-sa κορωνόFεσσα (κορωνός •curve •crook •crown (pot decoration)‘ko-ro-nο-’ like: (κορωνός= curved,crooked/κορώνη= sea-crow

𓈖𓅓𓋴 Nemes - striped head-dress of pharaohs @ nomes Uraeus – Rearing Cobra
𓋑 Hedjet (white crown) vulture pharaohs of Upper Egypt; the deities Horus and Nekhbet
𓋔 Deshret (red crown) uraeus pharaohs of Lower Egypt and the desert Red Land; the deities Horus, Wadjet and Neith
𓋚 Atef hedjet with ostrich feathers, worn by Osiris,
𓋖 Pschent, Greek ψχεντ, Egyptian sḫm.tỉ, sekhemti (double crown) deshret and hedjet; uraeus and vulture pharaohs, and their Horus
𓋙 Khepresh (blue crown or war crown) uraeus see Mars New Kingdom pharaohs in battle and ceremonies
